troubleshooting.title: Coil Vibrator Adjustment Guidelines
troubleshooting.shortdesc: Factory-adjusted coil units should only be readjusted when installing new points or addressing wear-related gap increases, preferably by authorized service stations.

condition.p: Coil vibrator points require adjustment or maintenance.

cause.p: Points may be worn or pitted, causing increased gap distance.

step.cmd: Visit an authorized service station when possible.
step.info: Service stations have specialized testing and adjustment equipment.

cause.p: If service station is not available and points are pitted:

step.cmd: File the points flat using a fine double-faced file.
Turn down the adjusting thumb nut.
step.info: With spring held down, gap should be slightly less than 1/32 inch.

info.p: This prevents the adjustment from being disturbed.

ul.li: Do not hammer on the vibrators

note.p: These actions can damage the cushion spring of the vibrator bridge and reduce unit efficiency.
